name: fifteen-million-merits
title: Fifteen Million Merits
description: A persistent counter that triggers Raycast Focus mode when activity exceeds a specific threshold.
author: alexi.build

commands.name: show-ai-agent-sessions-counter
commands.title: Show AI Agent Sessions Counter
commands.subtitle: Fifteen Million Merits
commands.description: Displays the current number of active AI Agent sessions and focus state.

commands.name: setup-ai-agent
commands.title: Setup AI Agent Hooks
commands.subtitle: Fifteen Million Merits
commands.description: Configures Claude and Cursor to trigger counter when sessions start or end.

preferences.name: focusGoal
preferences.title: Focus Goal
preferences.description: The goal to show when Raycast Focus starts (e.g., 'Fifteen Million Merits Challenge')

preferences.name: focusCategories
preferences.title: Focus Categories
preferences.description: Comma-separated categories to block (available: gaming, messaging, news, shopping, social, streaming, travel)

preferences.name: distractionThreshold
preferences.title: Distraction Threshold
preferences.description: Minimum active sessions needed to disable Focus Mode. At least 1 agent must be active (default).

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
